alert.note: Alert for Inland Nassau; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 1:54PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Nassau and north central Duval Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 154 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm just west of Jacksonville International Arpt, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds near 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Callahan, Jacksonville International Arpt, Ratliff and Nassau Village-Ratliff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Inland Nassau; Trout River; Western Duval
